summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FieldOS Calendar, Inbox/Conversations, and Quotes features. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). All requested features are functional and accessible. Calendar job creation/editing, Inbox SMS messaging, and Quotes import from Lead/Vapi Call feature all working correctly.

Authentication - Login working with owner@radiancehvac.com credentials
Calendar Page - New Job button found and clickable

Calendar Page - Job creation form includes Customer, Job Type, Priority, Start/End Time, Technician, Notes fields
Calendar Page - Schedule Job and Cancel buttons functional

Calendar Page - Calendar navigation (month view, Today button) working
Inbox/Conversations Page - Loads successfully with conversations list
Inbox/Conversations Page - Shows 3 conversations (John Jones, Robert Miller, Jane Wilson)
Inbox/Conversations Page - Search conversations field present and functional
Inbox/Conversations Page - Message thread view working when clicking on conversations
Inbox/Conversations Page - SMS message input field and send button functional
Inbox/Conversations Page - Customer information display (name, phone number) working
Inbox/Conversations Page - Message status indicators (Delivered, timestamps) present
Quotes Page - NEW QUOTE button found and clickable
Quotes Page - Create Quote dialog opens successfully
Quotes Page - Import from Lead/Vapi Call dropdown feature present and functional
Quotes Page - Quote form includes Customer, Amount, Description fields

Dashboard - Recent Messages section shows SMS conversations
